bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2010 to provide language interpreters at driver licensing stations, two in Sioux Falls, two in Rapid City, and  two in Aberdeen.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2010 to provide language interpreters at driver licensing stations, two in Sioux Falls, two in Rapid City, and two in Aberdeen. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 2 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF EXECUTIVE MANAGEMENT (1) Office of the Governor F.T.E., delete "22.5" and insert "16.5" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 12 of chapter 22 of the 2009 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY (4) Inspection and Licensing F.T.E., delete "90.5" and insert "96.5" Adjust all totals accordingly.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
